articles.author: Daniel Patrascu
articles.title: Hot Burning Rocket Engines Could Turn the Moon's Surface Into Instant Landing Pads - autoevolution
articles.description: The Plume Additive for Reducing Surface Ejecta and Cratering (PARSEC) is a tech meant to reduce the amount of regolith debris thrown up during Moon landings
articles.content: Every single inch of the lunar surface is covered by a thick layer of charcoal-gray dust we call regolith. It is the result of asteroids, meteoroids, and comets hammering the surface of the Moon for … [+4598 chars]
